price: پەرۋەردىگارىمىز! ھېساب ئالىدىغان كۈندە (يەنى قىيامەت كۈنىدە) ماڭا، ئاتا ـ ئانامغا ۋە مۆمىنلەرگە مەغپىرەت قىلغىن»[41].
arabic: رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡحِسَابُ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā igh'fir lī waliwālidayya walil'mu'minīna yawma yaqūmu al-ḥisābu
